body.text:
/*
check x-src-mocks-manager header. it should be live or nothing.
After receiving response. go to mdes utility and do base64 decode. don't worry about just character 
*/
{
    "cipher": "",
    "wrappedKey": "",
    "unwrappingKeyFingerprint": "d1dd85789e83ec52199ae5d80d475e20f9a9fe73",
    "iv": "454ae581d6408733ba6b11f43916b9d2",
    "oaepHashingAlgorithm": "SHA256"
}
